headline.print_headline: Feds Seek Option for Dredge Sand Along NC Beaches
headline.main: Feds Seek Option for Dredge Sand Along NC Beaches

lead_paragraph: Beach communities and environmentalists are pushing back against a proposal to give the National Park Service the option of using dredging material to fight erosion on North Carolina's pristine Shackleford Banks, where wild horses roam and no humans live.
